channel.title: SIKKIM on North by Northeast Journeys | Adventure, Nature and Culture Tours in Northeast India
channel.description: Recent content in SIKKIM on North by Northeast Journeys | Adventure, Nature and Culture Tours in Northeast India

item.title: Sikkim & W Bengal: Singalila Ridge and the Barsey Rhododendron Sanctuary | TREKKING HOLIDAY
item.description: A Trek amongst the giants The hills of North Bengal and Sikkim are a mystical land of abundant natural beauty with verdant forests, quaint sub alpine villages and high towering mountains.

item.title: Sikkim & W Bengal: Monastic Trail | CYCLE TOUR
item.description: Of Mountains and Monastries This cycling tour of Sikkim and West Bengal takes us through East, South and Western districts of Sikkim and the Darjeeling district of West Bengal.
